name: RealGOAT
description: The GOAT (Greatest of All Tokens) is a novel meme token built on the Bitcoin blockchain using the BRC-20 token standard. Inspired by the legendary status of Bitcoin (BTC) as the original and most inﬂuential cryptocurrency, GOAT aims to capture the essence of BTC’s dominance while adding a playful twist. In this white paper, we delve into the concept, mechanics, and vision behind GOAT.
